original_text: When I was informed of a plot to be carried out against the man, I sent him to you at once. I also ordered his accusers to present to you their case against him.
korean_text: 그러나 이 사람을 해하려는 간계가 있다고 누가 내게 알려 주기로 곧 당신께로 보내며 또 고발하는 사람들도 당신 앞에서 그에 대하여 말하라 하였나이다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: When I was informed of a plot
to be carried out against the man
I sent him to you at once
to present to you their case against him
sentences.korean_translation: 너에게 그를 대항한 그들의 사건을 제출하라고
